description.zh-cn: 中国生殖医学专家，中国工程院院士，现任北京大学常务副校长、医学部主任。
description.en: Chinese reproductive medicine expert, academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, currently serving as Executive Vice President of Peking University and Director of the Peking University Health Science Center.

description.zh-cn: 中国黑龙江省的省会。
description.en: The capital of Heilongjiang Province, China.

en: Academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering

description.zh-cn: 中国工程科学技术方面的最高学术称号。
description.en: The highest academic title in engineering science and technology in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所顶尖综合性大学。
description.en: A top comprehensive university in China.

description.zh-cn: 北京大学的医学教育、科研和医疗机构。
description.en: The medical education, research, and healthcare institution of Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 集医疗、教学、科研和预防保健为一体的现代化综合性三级甲等医院。
description.en: A modern, comprehensive Grade A tertiary hospital that integrates medical care, teaching, research, and preventive healthcare.

description.zh-cn: 原为独立的医科大学，后与北京大学合并，成为北京大学医学部。
description.en: Formerly an independent medical university, it merged with Peking University to become the Peking University Health Science Center.

en: China Association for Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 中国科学技术工作者的群众组织。
description.en: A mass organization for scientific and technological workers in China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会
en: 14th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的第十四届全国委员会。
description.en: The 14th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国医学家，中国工程院院士，曾任北京大学常务副校长、医学部主任。
description.en: Chinese medical scientist, academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, former Executive Vice President of Peking University and Director of the Peking University Health Science Center.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国遗传学领域的全国性学术团体。
description.en: A national academic society in the field of genetics in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育部与香港李嘉诚基金会共同实施的重大人才工程。
description.en: A major talent project jointly implemented by the Ministry of Education of China and the Li Ka Shing Foundation in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 乔杰出生于黑龙江哈尔滨。
description.en: Qiao Jie was born in Harbin, Heilongjiang.

description.zh-cn: 1987年毕业于北京医科大学医学系，获学士学位。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of Medicine, Beijing Medical University in 1987 with a bachelor's degree.

description.zh-cn: 1990年获北京医科大学第三医院妇产科医学硕士学位。
description.en: Received a Master's degree in Medicine (Obstetrics and Gynecology) from the Third Hospital of Beijing Medical University in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 1996年获北京医科大学第三医院妇产科博士学位。
description.en: Received a Doctorate degree in Obstetrics and Gynecology from the Third Hospital of Beijing Medical University in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 乔杰是中国工程院院士。
description.en: Qiao Jie is an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering.

position.en: Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 接替詹启敏出任北京大学常务副校长。
description.en: Succeeded Zhan Qimin as Executive Vice President of Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 接替詹启敏出任北京大学医学部主任。
description.en: Succeeded Zhan Qimin as Director of Peking University Health Science Center.

description.zh-cn: 北京大学医学部是北京大学的组成部分。
description.en: Peking University Health Science Center is a component of Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 北京大学第三医院是北京大学的附属医院。
description.en: Peking University Third Hospital is an affiliated hospital of Peking University.
